INVALID_STATE.description: For [writeback](https://github.com/faucetsdn/udmi/blob/master/docs/writeback.md) testing. When `target_value` is applied to the `set_value` in the config block, the state of the point should be `invalid`

FAILURE_STATE.description: For [writeback](https://github.com/faucetsdn/udmi/blob/master/docs/writeback.md) testing. When `target_value` is applied to the `set_value` in the config block, the state of the point should be `failure`

APPLIED_STATE.description: For [writeback](https://github.com/faucetsdn/udmi/blob/master/docs/writeback.md) testing.  When `target_value` is applied to the `set_value` in the config block, the state of the point should be `applied`
